title: Generic component (v1alpha1)
description: Core untyped representation of a component (v1alpha1)

name.description: Defines the name of the component.

Properties.title: Generic component properties (v1alpha1)
Properties.description: Defines the properties of the component.

config.description: Specifies configuration for a non-runnable component. The contents of 'config' are defined by the kind of component.

run.description: Specifies configuration for a runnable component. The contents of 'run' are defined by the kind of component.

dependsOn.description: Specifies service dependencies of this component.

provides.description: Specifies services provided by this component.

traits.description: Specifies traits applied to this component.

kind.description: Defines the kind of service or protocol.
